front.title: BGPSEC Design Choices and Summary of Supporting Discussions

abstract.t: This document has been written to capture the design rationale for the individual draft-00 version of BGPSEC protocol specification (I-D.lepinski-bgpsec-protocol-00). It lists the decisions that were made in favor of or against each design choice, and presents brief summaries of the arguments that aided the decision process. A similar document can be published in the future as the BGPSEC design discussions make further progress and additional design considerations are discussed and finalized.
